author: "Croll, Oswald, approximately 1560-1609"
title: "Basilica chymica, pluribus selectis & secretissimis propria manuali experientia approbatis descriptionibus, & usu remediorum chymicorum selectissimorum / aucta a Joan. Hartmanno ... Edita a Johanne Michaelis ... et Georg. Everhardo Hartmanno ..."
